channel.title: EPortfolio on Michael Healy
channel.description: Recent content in EPortfolio on Michael Healy

item.title: Theories of Composition ePortfolio
item.description: This is my Spring 2017 Composition Theory ePortfolio. The links go to the individual components that have been selected for inclusion. The selections here represent some of the work of this semester though is not inclusive. I also intend for these selections and reflections to look back to what I brought into the class, what I learned here, and forward to new contexts. At the bottom of this page are links to and brief descriptions of each artifact collected.
